Package animals

Class Animal

java.lang.Object
java.util.Observable
animals.Animal
All Implemented Interfaces:
IEdible, ColoredAnimal, IAnimalBehavior, IDrawable, Cloneable, Runnable
Direct Known Subclasses:
Bear, Elephant, Giraffe, Lion, Turtle
public abstract class Animal extends Observable implements IEdible, IDrawable, IAnimalBehavior, ColoredAnimal, Cloneable, Runnable
the usefulness of this class is to create instances of animals that will belong to the zoo, the class will allow them to perform actions on different breeds of animals such as moving them, feeding them etc...
Version:
26.03.2022
Author:
Rudy Haddad
